lore: When King Misery began searching for Smiths throughout the kingdoms, some of his slaves decided to help him by revealing where their acquaintances were in exchange for freedom. From that moment they became a nomadic group of renegades who reject cities, wars, kingdoms and their laws. At present, those traitors are already dead, but their descendants have preserved their nomadic tradition, as well as their resentment towards society.
menagerieDialog: I'm far more skilled in forging weapons than fighting creatures.
The final step to forging a mighty blade is to let it taste a bit of blood. Let's go!
Never leave home without ensuring that all your Artifacts are fully upgraded.
A creature without an artifact is like a human without pants. It just doesn't make any sense.
I grow tired of this incessant fighting. I'd rather spend my time doing what I love: forging weapons and armor.
name: Depravity Smith
